title: Episode 209 “First Round 2020”
itunes:title: Episode 209 “First Round 2020”
description:
N.O.R.E. & DJ EFN are the Drink Champs. In this episode we are toasting to a legendary first round of episodes. Giving our guests their flowers while they can smell them and drinks while they can drink them, we relive some of our favorite moments from this years 1st quarter of episodes.
